Sql.CDATA:
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sys.views WHERE NAME = 'V_GLCompareIN' AND type = 'V') DROP VIEW V_GLCompareIN; GO
CREATE VIEW V_GLCompareIN AS SELECT gl.CompanyID, gl.BranchID, gl.Module, gl.BatchNbr, gl.LedgerID, gl.AccountID, gl.SubID, gl.FinPeriodID, gl.CuryCreditAmt, gl.CuryDebitAmt FROM GLTran gl INNER JOIN Account a ON a.CompanyID = gl.CompanyID AND a.AccountID = gl.AccountID WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INTran WHERE CompanyID = 2 AND INTran.TranType = gl.TranType AND INTran.RefNbr = gl.RefNbr) AND gl.CompanyID = 2 AND a.AccountCD = '1130000' GO
